m_szDocTitle: How to Destroy $100 Trillion in 18 Months or Less | Equities.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- How to Destroy $100 Trillion in 18 Months or Less Tuesday, 09 February 2016 10:01  (EST) “We aren’t addicted to oil, but our cars are.” – James Woolsey “The greatest asset, even in this country, is not oil and gas. It’s integrity.” – George Foreman If energy powers the world, then whoever owns that energy must have power over the world. That’s certainly been the case for the last century or two. Ownership of our primary energy source, crude oil, is what made billionaires of John D. Rockefeller, H.L. Hunt, and assorted Middle Eastern kings, emirs, and sheikhs. O
